trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os dados para o evento **RowUpdating** de um provedor de dados .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
trans-unit.target: O `RowUpdating` evento normalmente é gerado antes um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> para uma linha começa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> to <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> para <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> to execute when <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> a ser executado quando <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de instrução SQL a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> to send through an <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> a ser enviado por meio de um <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> object for an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> para uma instância desta classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> to execute during the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> a ser executado durante o <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite implementações executar a verificação de tipo para o <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> atribuição de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
trans-unit.target: Válido somente <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objetos, por exemplo um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> de objeto, deve ser permitido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> to execute during the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> a ser executado durante a operação <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> to execute during the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> a ser executado durante o <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém erros gerados pelo provedor de dados .NET Framework quando o <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command" /> é executado.

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: Os erros gerados pelo provedor de dados .NET Framework quando o <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command" /> executa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> que será enviado ao servidor como parte de uma operação de inserção, atualização ou exclusão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> to send through an <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> a ser enviado por meio de um <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de instrução SQL a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de instrução SQL a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs.StatementType%2A> can be one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs.StatementType%2A> Pode ser um dos seguintes valores:

trans-unit.source: Select
trans-unit.target: Selecionar

trans-unit.source: Insert
trans-unit.target: Inserir

trans-unit.source: Update
trans-unit.target: Atualização

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: Excluir

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateStatus" /> of the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateStatus" /> da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Continue" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Continue" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> to send through the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> a ser enviado por meio de <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> to send through the <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> para enviar por meio de <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
